title: Installer: curl|sh install script

Script should download a pinned release artifact (from GitHub releases) and fail safely.

title: Docs: warn about bd sync --from-main overwriting .beads
description: DoD: Update .beads/README.md to note that 'bd sync --from-main' checks out .beads from origin/main and can overwrite uncommitted .beads changes; document safe usage (clean tree / commit first) and the 'origin -> .' workaround for local-only repos.

title: Shim doctor: actionable checks
description: Improve ackchyually shim doctor to validate shim dir/PATH ordering, list installed shims, detect broken symlinks, and verify real tool resolution (skipping shims). Provide clear fix-it output; must not weaken PTY behavior.
notes: Done: shim doctor now checks shim dir existence, PATH presence/order, DB file presence, shim symlink integrity, and real tool resolution (excluding shims); exits non-zero on problems. PR: TBD.

title: Export: stricter redaction for agents
description: Make export redaction stricter than DB redaction: normalize/remove absolute paths outside repo/home, redact env-style KEY=VALUE secrets, and ensure exported output is safe to paste into agent chats.
notes: Implemented export-only sanitization for argv/context: env KEY=VALUE redaction heuristics, PATH segment sanitization, and anonymization for /Users/<user>/ and /home/<user>/ paths. Also enhanced redactor to handle --flag=<value> forms and additional secret patterns. PR: TBD.

title: Perf: add benchmarks and nightly workflow
description: Add a small benchmark suite for hot paths (redaction, shell-join, store JSON) and a scheduled GitHub Actions workflow to run them nightly and upload results as an artifact.
notes: Done: added microbenchmarks (redact, shelljoin, MustJSON), just bench, and a nightly workflow (.github/workflows/perf.yml) that uploads bench.txt as an artifact. PR: TBD.

title: Beads: move deletions.jsonl into .beads/
description: Align repo with AGENTS.md: track deletions in .beads/deletions.jsonl (not repo root). Move the current root deletions.jsonl into .beads/ and keep it covered by merge driver rules.
notes: Done: deletions now tracked at .beads/deletions.jsonl (git). PR: TBD.

title: Optional auto-exec: known_success mode
description: Implement optional auto-exec policy (default off). In known_success mode, on usage-ish failures and when running interactively (TTY), automatically re-run the top known successful command for the same tool+context. Must be loop-safe and PTY-correct.
notes: Implemented opt-in known_success auto-exec (default off). When ACKCHYUALLY_AUTO_EXEC=known_success and running in a TTY, usage-ish failures will re-run the top known-success command for the same tool+context (skips commands containing <redacted> and avoids re-running the same argv). PR: TBD.

notes: Added MAINTAINERS.md with first-time setup checklist (Pages, DNS, branch protections, optional Codecov). PR: TBD.

title: Epic: Exec engine (pipes + PTY)
description: PTY-first execution for TTY, pipes for non-TTY.

title: Tool identity: cache sha256 by exe path
description: Avoid hashing the tool binary on every invocation. Cache sha256 in the local DB keyed by exe_path + file metadata (size + mtime) and recompute only when the binary changes.
notes: Added tool_path_cache table and updated toolid.Identify to reuse cached sha256 based on exe_path + (size, mtime). Hashing the tool binary now happens only when it changes. Added tests to ensure cached sha avoids rehashing when the file becomes unreadable.

title: Ops: enable Pages, discussions, branch protection

notes: Completed via gh CLI: enabled Discussions; enabled Pages with build_type=workflow; set Pages custom domain to ackchyually.sh; protected main requiring test (ubuntu-latest), test (macos-latest), golangci, and 1 approving review. HTTPS enforcement pending cert issuance after DNS.
